channel.title: GIANT MODE / ANTMAN MOD: Is it possible?
channel.description:
Handheld device that has 5 "Player Size" modes:
1/8, 1/2, 1:1, x4, x16.
camera height, movement speed, jump height, collision hitbox (tight spaces)
Maybe in giant mode you can just trample enemies?
Could be fun!
